avakiriya：avakiriya（kri，vi）
အဝကိရိယ（ကြိ၊ဝိ）
[ava+kira+tvā]
[အဝ+ကိရ+တွာ]
avakiriya：[abs．of avakirati] having scattered or thrown away．
Avakiriya，[grd of avakirati] to be cast out or thrown away; rejectable，low，contemptible J．V，143 （taken by C．as ger．= avakiritvā）．（Page 81）
AVAKIRIYA：（[abs] của avakiraṭi） đang rải ra hay là thảy ra

[အဝ+ကိရ+တွာ]
ကြဲဖြန့်၍။
